name: LapelAthletics
0:
”Alexa, ask Lapel Athletics what's going on tonight”
”Alexa, ask Lapel Athletics what's happening on April 27.”
”Alexa, ask Lapel Athletics what's happening next weekend.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lapel athletics
des:
Calling all Lapel Bulldog parents, students, faculty and fans! Curious to know what events are happening tonight, tomorrow, this weekend and more? Use this skill to find out so you don't miss a thing!

If Alexa returns the wrong date for words like "Today" and "Tomorrow", you may need to set your device location by browsing to the Settings area in the Alexa app. The device location is required to obtain accurate results based on the time zone of your Alexa device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
